title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2023 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2004 (Section 91) (Deferred
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2004 (Section 91) (Deferred 

Surrender to Central Fund) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance act 2004 (section 91) (deferred surrender central fund) order 2025

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2023 (S.I. No.
heading: 2. The sums set out in column (5) of the Schedule, amounting in the
text_raw:
2. The sums set out in column (5) of the Schedule, amounting in the 
aggregate to €192,496,000 are determined to be available for making good 
supply in the year ending 31 December 2025 for the capital supply services and 
purposes by reference to the Vote Number, Title, Capital Subheads and 
Descriptions mentioned in columns (1), (2), (3) and (4), respectively, of that 
Schedule, opposite the amount mentioned in column (5) in respect of each 
Capital Subhead. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [44]
text_norm: 2 sum set column (5) schedule amounting aggregate eur192 496 000 determined available making good supply year ending 31 december 2025 capital supply service purpose reference vote number title capital subhead description mentioned column (1) (2) (3) (4) respectively schedule opposite amount mentioned column (5) respect capital subhead 4 44
